title: Update dialog boxes and pop-ups with bold technological styling using capital flow page colors

requirements.text: Update all dialog boxes and modal components to use a bold technological visual style matching the color scheme from the GlobalCapitalFlow component (emerald/cyan gradient with dark backgrounds)

quotes: deixe as caixas de diálogo e pop-ups com visual ... arrojado tecnológico usando as mesmas cores... da pagina de fluxo de capital

acceptanceCriteria: All modal dialogs (SubscriptionModal, ProfileSetupModal, PaymentConfirmationModal) use emerald/cyan gradient backgrounds with dark overlays
Dialog styling matches the technological aesthetic of the GlobalCapitalFlow visualization
No transparent or semi-transparent dialog boxes remain in the application

requirements.text: Remove all transparent backgrounds from dialog boxes and pop-ups, replacing them with solid dark backgrounds with emerald/cyan accent gradients
acceptanceCriteria: No dialog or modal component uses transparent or translucent backgrounds
All dialogs have solid backgrounds with appropriate contrast for readability
Background styling uses dark colors with emerald (#10b981) and cyan accents consistent with the capital flow page

constraints: Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain existing modal functionality and user interactions
nonGoals: Changing the functionality of existing modals
